chunk:
Directions: 1. Cleanse and tone skin. 2. Remove mask from packaging and apply to the face for 15-20 minutes. 3. Pat in the remaining essence onto the skin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
